config.query: SELECT e.id, TO_TIMESTAMP( SUBSTRING(e.modified, 1, 26), 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI:SS.US' ) as timestamp, e.modified as incrementing, e.revision, e.payload, s.name, s.revision from kernel_entity e inner join kernel_projectschema ps on e.projectschema_id = ps.id inner join kernel_schema s on ps.schema_id = s.id
